initial_setup_wizard_subtitle: This wizard will guide you through the initial configuration of your Defguard instance.
initial_setup_welcome_title: Welcome to Defguard initial configuration wizard.
initial_setup_welcome_subtitle: This wizard walks you through the steps to configure your VPN connection with a simple and intuitive setup process.
initial_setup_step_admin_user_descriptio: Manage core details and connection parameters for your VPN location.
initial_setup_step_general_config_descri: Manage core details and connection parameters for your VPN location.
initial_setup_step_edge_component_descri: Set up your VPN proxy quickly and ensure secure, optimized traffic flow for your users.
initial_setup_step_edge_adoption_descrip: Review the system’s checks and see if any issues need attention before deployment.
initial_setup_step_confirmation_descript: Your configuration was successful. You’re all set.
initial_setup_admin_user_password_rule_m: Password must be at least 8 characters
initial_setup_admin_user_password_rule_n: Password must contain at least one number
initial_setup_admin_user_password_rule_s: Password must contain at least one special character
initial_setup_admin_user_password_rule_l: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
initial_setup_admin_user_password_rule_u: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
initial_setup_admin_user_error_username_: Username must be at least 3 characters
initial_setup_admin_user_error_create_fa: Failed to create admin user. Please try again.
initial_setup_general_config_error_admin: Default admin group name is required
initial_setup_general_config_error_auth_: Authentication period must be at least 1 day
initial_setup_general_config_error_mfa_t: MFA code timeout must be at least 60 seconds
initial_setup_general_config_error_save_: Failed to create admin user. Please try again.
initial_setup_general_config_error_publi: Public Proxy URL must be a valid URL
initial_setup_ca_error_validity_min: Validity period must be at least 1 year
initial_setup_ca_error_create_failed: Failed to create CA. Please review the information and try again.
initial_setup_ca_error_upload_failed: Failed to upload CA. Please ensure the certificate file is valid and try again.
initial_setup_ca_option_create_descripti: By choosing this option, Defguard will create its own certificate authority and automatically configure all components to use its certificates — no manual setup required.
initial_setup_ca_option_use_own_descript: Upload your certificate authority certificate and Defguard will use it to issue and configure certificates for components.
initial_setup_ca_generated_subtitle: The system created all required certificate files, including the root certificate and private key. You can download these files and continue with the configuration.
initial_setup_ca_validated_subtitle: Your uploaded Certificate Authority has been successfully validated. All required files were checked and confirmed as correct and ready for use. You can download the validated CA files if needed for your setup.
initial_setup_confirmation_error_finish_: Failed to finish setup. Please try again.
initial_setup_confirmation_lead: You've completed the first stage of the setup. Defguard is almost ready to go.
initial_setup_confirmation_title: In order to fully deploy Defguard you need:
initial_setup_confirmation_action_subtit: To organize users, manage access, track users activity and device monitoring.
initial_setup_confirmation_footer: Once you create your first location, the only step left will be to connect a gateway — and the system will be fully ready to use. This usually takes about n 10–15 minutes, depending on the complexity of your VPN configuration.
